unnormalised: As per Dr. Sharma's recommendation at AIIMS, post-op chemo with Cisplatin 75mg/m2 is indicated for Stage IIIC colon cancer. The patient, Mrs. Devi, needs to start treatment by 10/11/2024. Please note the oncologist, Dr. Patel, also advised a PET scan at Apollo Hospitals beforehand to rule out any distant metastasis. This will cost approximately Rs. 15000.
normalised: As per Doctor Sharma's recommendation at A-I-I-M-S, post-op chemo with Cisplatin seventy five milligram per meter squared is indicated for Stage three C colon cancer. The patient, Missus Devi, needs to start treatment by tenth November two thousand and twenty four. Please note the oncologist, Doctor Patel, also advised a P-E-T scan at Apollo Hospitals beforehand to rule out any distant metastasis. This will cost approximately rupees fifteen thousand.
